original: Ljungdorff, Per-Ulrik Vilhelm, rektor, Gislaved, f. 14/12/10 i Malmö av fil. dr Vilhelm L. o. h. h., f. Sjögren. G. 38 m. fil. kand. Elin lönsson. Barn: UMa f. 39, Bengt 43. — Stud:ex. i Lund 31, fil. kand. där 35, fil. mag. 36, hc:stud. i tyska 36-37, provår i Malmö 43. Res. t. Tyskl. 32, 37, 38, Danm. 39. E. adj. i Halmstad 37-38, e. ämneslär. v. Gislaveds h. folksk. 38-41, e. o. ämneslär. där 42, v. Gislaveds komm. mellansk. 43, ord. ämneslär. där 44, adj. v. samrealsk. 46, rektor v. Gislaveds h. folksk. o. komm. mellansk. 38, v. samrealsk. fr. 46. Led. av Bårarj^ds komm:fullm. sed. 43, dess v. ordf. sed. 45 m. fl. komm. uppdrag. Skr.: art. i språkl. frågor i tidn. o. tid-skr.
translated: Ljungdorff, Per-Ulrik Vilhelm, headmaster, Gislaved, born on December 14, 1910 in Malmö to PhD Vilhelm L. and his wife, maiden name Sjögren. Married to Elin Lönsson in 1938. Children: UMa, born in 1939, Bengt, born in 1943. Completed high school exams in Lund in 1931, graduated with a Bachelor's degree there in 1935, obtained a Master's degree in 1936, studied German as a special student from 1936 to 1937, and did a probationary year in Malmö in 1943. Traveled to Germany in 1932, 1937, 1938, and to Denmark in 1939. Worked as a substitute teacher in Halmstad from 1937 to 1938, as a subject teacher at Gislaved primary school from 1938 to 1941, as an associate subject teacher there in 1942, at Gislaveds kommunalmellanskola from 1943, as a regular subject teacher there in 1944, as a substitute teacher at the secondary school from 1946, and as headmaster at Gislaveds primary school and kommunalmellanskola from 1938, and at the secondary school from 1946. Member of Bårarj^ds municipal council since 1943, serving as vice-chairman since 1945, and participating in other municipal assignments. Has written articles on language issues in newspapers and magazines.
